{{c/core|ranges::join_with_view&lt;V, Pattern&gt;::}}{{tti|sentinel}} is the type of the sentinels returned by {{rlpf|end}} of {{c/core|ranges::join_with_view&lt;V, Pattern&gt;}}.

If an iterator compares equal with a sentinel, the iterator is a past-the-end iterator.

{{par|Const|whether the sentinel corresponds to a constant iterator}}
